TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExpressionConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Docs.summary: Converts instances of to and from other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Expression> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values (should use markup extensions instead). For this reason, <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.CanConvertTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> always return `false`. <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.ConvertFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.ConvertTo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> always throw an exception.
